actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to permit immediate retirement of certain Federal employees.

summary.text: Permits immediate retirement, with entitlement to a reduced annuity, for an employee separated from the Civil Service while his agency is undergoing a major reduction in force, as determined by the Civil Service Commission, if such employee has completed 25 years of service, or is 50 years of age and has completed 20 years of service. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336(d))

titles.title: A bill to permit immediate retirement of certain Federal employees.
